00044 /*
00045  * Initialize all interrupt priorities present in AVR XMega CPU.
00046  */
00047 void __init(void)
00048 {
00049     PMIC.CTRL |= PMIC_LOLVLEX_bm | PMIC_MEDLVLEX_bm | PMIC_HILVLEX_bm;
00050 }
